fields.name: dptxtCreateCatalog
fields.fieldText:
Sample Payload to create Catalog


﻿{

 "name": "Catalog Wholesale Business",

 "description": "Sample Catalog for demo purpose",

 "catalogType": "ProductCatalog",

 "version": "1.0",

 "validFor": {

   "startDateTime": "2020-08-29T00:00:00Z",

   "endDateTime": "2024-03-25T00:00:00Z"

 },

 "lifecycleStatus": "Active",

 "@type": "Catalog",

"relatedParty": [

{

"id": "012345678",

"name": "Stardust Enterprises",

"role": "Business",

"@referredType": "Account",

"@type": "RelatedParty"

} 

]

}

fields.name: dptxtCreateCatalog_0
fields.fieldText:
Sample Payload to create Category


{

 "description": "Specifies a category to hold all available cloud service offers.",

 "lifecycleStatus": "Active", 

 "name": "Cloud Services",

"validFor": {

  "startDateTime": "2020-08-24T00:00:00Z",

  "endDateTime": "2024-03-25T00:00:00Z"

 },

"relatedParty": [

{

"id": "012345678",

"name": "Stardust Enterprises",

"role": "Business",

"@referredType": "Account",

"@type": "RelatedParty"

}

]

 "isRoot": true,

 "subCategory": [

  {

   "name": "Cloud Storage",

   "@type": "CategoryRef"

   },

  {

   "name": "Software as a Service",

   "@type": "CategoryRef"

  }

 ],

 "@type": "Category"

}

fields.name: dptxtCreateCatalog_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Sample Payload to create Product Specification


{

"description": "Powerful product that integrates with a firewall, including intrusion prevention, advanced malware protection, cloud-based sandboxing, URL filtering, endpoint protection, web gateway, email security, network traffic analysis, network access control and CASB.",

"name": "Cisco Firepower1",

“targetProductSchema” : {

“@type”: “Business Internet Object Type”

},

"productNumber": "CSC-340-NGFW",

"lifecycleStatus": "Active",

"validFor": {

"startDateTime": "2020-09-23T00:00:00.0Z",

"endDateTime": "2022-11-24T16:42:23.0Z"

},

"version": "2.0",

"isBundle": true,

"productSpecCharacteristic": [

{

"name": "Number of Ports",

"description": "The total Number of Ports for this parts",

"valueType": "number",

"configurable": true,

"minCardinality": 1,

"maxCardinality": 1,

"isUnique": true,

"@type": "ProductSpecificationCharacteristic",

"@baseType": "",

"productSpecCharacteristicValue": [

{

"isDefault": true,

"valueType": "number",

"validFor": {

"startDateTime": "2020-09-23T00:00:00Z",

"endDateTime": "2024-11-24T00:00:00Z"

},

"value": 8

}]

}

],

"attachment": [

{

"name": "Product Picture",

"url": "https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/small-business/security/firewalls.html",

"mimeType": "image/jpeg",

"@referredType": "Attachment",

"@type": "AttachmentRefOrValue",

"@baseType": ""

}

]


}

fields.name: dptxtCreateCatalog_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Sample Payload to create Product Offering


{

"name": “Airtel Wifi Router",

"description": “Airtel Wifi Router with 1000Mbps Bandwidth",

"isSellable": "true",

"isBundle": "false",

"productNumber": “Airtel_Wifi_Router",

"productOfferingPrice":{

"name": "Airtel WiFi Router PriceList Entry",

"description": "Recurring Monthly Price for Router",

"isBundle" : "true",

"price": {

      "taxIncludedAmount": {

                 "value": 30,

                 "unit": "USD"

                 }

        },

"priceType": "Recurring",

                        "recurringChargePeriod": "Monthly",

"lifecycleStatus" :"Active",

"validFor": {

“startDateTime": "2022-08-25T00:00:00Z",

“endDateTime": "2024-05-23T00:00:00Z"

    }

},

"productSpecification": {

"id": "dbd23067-bc2d-562c-08b6-7fa7d6032042"

},

"attachment": [

{

"description": "This attachment gives a block diagram of the firewall.",

"mimeType": "image/jpeg",

"url": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41Q04ArdEuL._SL1000_.jpg"

}],

"category" : [

{

"id" : "8ad6f687-56aa-9ccd-bbc3-5f01214018d2" ,

"name" : "Cloud Storage"

}

],

"version": "1.0 ",

"lifecycleStatus": "Active",

"validFor": {

"endDateTime": "2022-08-25T00:00:00Z",

"startDateTime": "2022-05-23T00:00:00Z"

}

}

fields.name: dptxtGetAllTickets
fields.fieldText:
To get the details of a ticket (cases) use the following URL-


/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/troubleticket/v57.0/troubleticket/{ID}


where ID is "casenumber" field in the Case Object.

fields.name: dptxt_getallproducts_637
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL-


Use the below URL to retrieve detail of all assets

/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/productopenapi/v1/product?fields=name,isBundle,isCustomerVisible

fields.name: dptxt_getaproduct_sample
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL-


Use the below URL to retrieve detail about a specific asset

/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/productopenapi/v1/product/<vlocity_cmt__AssetReferenceId__c>


where vlocity_cmt__AssetReferenceId__c is an attribute in the asset entity.


Sample Request-


/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/productopenapi/v1/product/a2af2a93-c5c8-e577-0a6e-51c72273e106


Sample Response-


{

 "productCharacteristic": [

  {

   "valueType": "Picklist",

   "name": "ATT_RT_GR"

  }

 ],

 "productPrice": [

  {

   "name": "a2l1Q000002jKwr",

   "description": "$74.99",

   "price": {

    "taxIncludedAmount": {

     "value": 74.99,

     "unit": "USD"

    }

   },

   "unitOfMeasure": "USD",

   "priceType": "One-time"

  }

 ],

 "relatedParty": [

  {

   "name": "Stardust Enterprises",

   "id": "012345678",

   "@referredType": "Account"

  }

 ],

 "href": "/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/productopenapi/v1/product/a2af2a93-c5c8-e577-0a6e-51c72273e106",

 "billingAccount": {

  "name": "Stardust Enterprises",

  "id": "012345678"

 },

 "status": "Active",

 "name": "Home Hub Modem",

 "id": "a2af2a93-c5c8-e577-0a6e-51c72273e106",

 "productOrderItem": [

  {

   "orderItemId": "0000000488",

   "orderItemAction": "Add",

   "productOrderId": "00000360"

  }

 ],

 "orderDate": "2023-12-27",

 "productOffering": {

  "name": "Home Hub Modem",

  "id": "01t1Q0000099s1yQAA"

 },

 "isCustomerVisible": true,

 "isBundle": "false"

}

fields.name: dptxtCreateCustomer
fields.fieldText:
Sample request to create an Account


{

 "name": "Sample Account TMF629",

 "engagedParty": 

  {

   "name": "Sean Forbes"

  },

 "account": [

  {

   "id": "0011Q00002aSB9QQAW",

   "name": "Acme"

  }

 ],

 "contactMedium": [

  {

   "mediumType": "Phone",

   "characteristic": {

    "phoneNumber": "(555) 555-1234"

   }

  },

  {

   "mediumType": "Fax",

   "characteristic": {

    "faxNumber": "(555) 123-4567"

   }

  },

  {

   "mediumType": "Email",

   "characteristic": {

    "emailAddress": "kevin.jarper@salesforce.com"

   }

  }

 ]

}

fields.name: dptxtCreateQuoteSample
fields.fieldText:
{

 "description": "Sample Quote created from 648",

 "category": "New Customer",

 "contactMedium": [

  {

   "mediumType": "Email",

   "characteristic": {

     "contactType": "Email",

     "emailAddress": "abc@salesforce.com"

   }

  },

  {

   "mediumType": "Phone",

   "characteristic": {

     "contactType": "Phone",

     "phoneNumber": "(990) 099-7788"

   }

  },

  {

   "mediumType": "Fax",

   "characteristic": {

     "contactType": "Fax",

     "faxNumber": "abc"

   }

  }

 ],

 "relatedParty": [

  {

    "id": "3263827",

    "role": "Account",

    "@referredType": "Account"

  },

  {

    "id": "0031Q00002jWCYOQA4",

    "role": "Contact",

    "@referredType": "Contact"

  }

 ],

 "quoteItem": [

  {

   "quantity": 1,

   "action": "add",

   "productOffering": [

    {

      "id": "a55e8ab4-57c9-cdfb-a3ee-455d5665a127",

      "name": "TMF648 Product",

      "@type": "Product2"

    }

   ]

  }

 ]

}

fields.name: dptxtCreateTicket
fields.fieldText:
Sample payload to create Trouble Ticket


{

"name": "Parent Case New created from TMF 621",

"status": "New",

"description": "new description testing",

"ticketType": "Problem",

"priority": "High",

"severity" : "Minor",

“Channel” : {

“Name” : “Phone”

},

"relatedParty": [

{

"id": "001Do00000DuNCvIAN",

"name": "Acme",

"@referredType" : "Account"

},

{

"id": "003Do00000Gn3oCIAR",

"name": "Leanne Tomlin",

"@referredType" : "Contact"

}

],

"attachment": [

{

"description": "Scanned disputed bill",

"mimeType": "image/png",

"name": "March Bill",

"url": "https://mycsp.com:7070/docloader?docnum=3534555",

"content": "This is sample attachment in the parent case"

}

],

"note": [

{

"author": "Jack Smith",

"date": "2019-05-31T07:34:45.968Z",

"text": "This is quite important, please approach me as soon as possible",

"@type": "Note"

}

]

}

fields.name: dptxtCreateTicket_0
fields.fieldText:

{

"name": "Parent Case New created from TMF 621",

"status": "New",

"description": "new description testing",

"priority": "High",

"severity" : "Minor",

},

{

"name": "Leanne Tomlin",

"@referredType" : "Contact"

}

],

"attachment": [

{

"description": "Scanned disputed bill",

"mimeType": "image/png",

"name": "March Bill",

"url": "https://mycsp.com:7070/docloader?docnum=3534555",

"content": "This is sample attachment in the parent case"

}

],

"note": [

{

"date": "2019-05-31T07:34:45.968Z",

"text": "This is quite important, please approach me as soon as possible",

"@type": "Note"

}

]

}

fields.name: dptxtDeleteAccount
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL-


Use the below URL to delete account

/services/data/v60.0/connect/comms/customermanagement/v4/customer/{ID}


where ID is the record Id of the account entity.

fields.name: dptxtGetAllQuotes
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL-


Use the below URL to retrieve detail of all quotes

/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/quotemanagement/v1/quote/

fields.name: dptxtGetaTicket
fields.fieldText:
To get the list of all the tickets (cases) use the following URL-


/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/troubleticket/v57.0/troubleticket/

fields.name: dptxtGetAQuote
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL-


Use the below URL to retrieve detail of a quote

/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/quotemanagement/v1/quote/{ID}


where ID is an QuoteNumber in the quote entity.


Sample Request-


/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/quotemanagement/v1/quote/00000048


Sample Response-

{

 "quoteTotalPrice": [

  {

   "price": {

    "taxIncludedAmount": {

     "value": 0,

     "unit": "$"

    }

   },

   "priceType": "Recurring"

  },

  {

   "price": {

    "taxIncludedAmount": {

     "value": 0,

     "unit": "$"

    }

   },

   "priceType": "One-time"

  }

 ],

 "relatedParty": [

  {

   "role": "Account",

   "name": "Acme",

   "id": "3263827",

   "href": "/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/quotemanagement/v48.0/Account/3263827",

   "@referredType": "Account"

  }

 ],

 "version": "V1",

 "href": "/services/apexrest/vlocity_cmt/tmforum/quotemanagement/v48.0/quote/00000048",

 "state": "Draft",

 "quoteDate": "2023-12-29T07:31:36.000+0000",

 "id": "00000048"

}

fields.name: dptxtGetCustomers
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL-


Use the below URL to retrieve detail of all accounts

/services/data/v60.0/connect/comms/customermanagement/v4/customer/

fields.name: dptxtRetrieveAccount
fields.fieldText:
Resource URL

﻿

/services/data/v60.0/connect/comms/customermanagement/v4/customer/{ID}


where ID is record id of the account entity.


Sample Response:


{

 "id" : "0011Q00002cGKf1QAG",

 "href" : "/connect/comms/customermanagement/v4/customer/0011Q00002cGKf1QAG",

 "@type" : "Customer",

 "name" : "Sample Account TMF629",

 "account" : [ {

  "id" : "0011Q00002aSB9QQAW",

  "href" : "/services/data/v60.0/sobjects/account/0011Q00002aSB9QQAW",

  "name" : "Acme",

  "referredType" : "Service",

  "description" : null

 } ],

 "engagedParty" : {

  "id" : "0031Q00002kVYTmQAO",

  "href" : "/services/data/v60.0/sobjects/contact/0031Q00002kVYTmQAO",

  "name" : "Sean Forbes",

  "role" : "Individual"

 },

 "contactMedium" : [ {

  "mediumType" : "Email",

  "characteristic" : {

   "contactType" : "Email",

   "emailAddress" : "kevin.jarper@salesforce.com",

   "faxNumber" : null,

   "phoneNumber" : null

  }

 }, {

  "mediumType" : "Fax",

  "characteristic" : {

   "contactType" : "Fax",

   "emailAddress" : null,

   "faxNumber" : "(555) 123-4567",

   "phoneNumber" : null

  }

 }, {

  "mediumType" : "Phone",

  "characteristic" : {

   "contactType" : "Phone",

   "emailAddress" : null,

   "faxNumber" : null,

   "phoneNumber" : "(555) 555-1234"

  }

 } ]

}

fields.name: dptxtTMFPayload
fields.fieldText:
TMF 620 Product Catalog API


Use the TMF620 Product Catalog Management Industry API to provide and manage a catalog of products. You can create a product catalog, add product offerings and specifications, and quote a price for each product offering.

fields.name: Select_your_option
fields.fieldText: Select your option

fields.name: dptxtTMFPayload_0
fields.fieldText:
TMF 621 Trouble Ticket Management API


The Trouble Ticket Management API provides a standardised client interface to Trouble Ticket Management Systems. The data exchange is compliant with the TM Forum's Open API specification

fields.name: Select_your_Option621
fields.fieldText: Select your Option

fields.name: dptxtTMFPayload_0_0
fields.fieldText:
TMF 622 Product Ordering API


Use the Product Ordering API to provide and manage products. The data exchange is compliant with the TM Forum's Open API specification.

fields.name: Select_your_option622
fields.fieldText: Select your option

fields.name: dptxtTMF629
fields.fieldText:
TMF 629 Customer Management API


The customer management API (TMF 629) provides a standardised mechanism for customer and customer account management, such as creation, update, retrieval and deletion of customers.

fields.name: Select_your_option629
fields.fieldText: Select your option

fields.name: dptxtTMF637Intro
fields.fieldText:
TMF 637 Product Inventory Management API


The Product Inventory Management API provides a standardised mechanism for product inventory management such as retrieval of the representation of a product or list of all products in the inventory. The data exchange is compliant with the TM Forum's Open API specification

fields.name: Select_your_option637
fields.fieldText: Select your option

fields.name: dptxt648
fields.fieldText:
TMF 648 Customer Quote Management API


Use the Quote Management API to create a customer quote as well as to retrieve a customer quote depending on filter criteria.

fields.name: Select_your_Option648
fields.fieldText: Select your Option

fields.name: dptxtSelectOption
fields.fieldText:
TMF Inbound APIs


This is an easy way especially designed for our users to quickly understand the TMF Inbound API.

In this journey we will ask you to select the specific variation of the API and showcase the record that gets created in the org with a sample example.

fields.name: rdbtnInboundSelection
fields.fieldText: Select the API
